keyMappings:
unmap x
unmap X
map q removeTab
map Q restoreTab

unmap >>
unmap <<
map <c-J> moveTabLeft
map <c-K> moveTabRight

unmap [[
unmap ]]
map < goPrevious
map > goNext

unmap G
map ge scrollToBottom

unmap `
map gm Marks.activateGotoMode

unmap gE
map e Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map E Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

unmap gt
unmap gT
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>
nextPatterns: next,more,newer,>,›,→,»,≫,>>,次へ,進む,もっと見る,もっとみる,次のページ
searchEngines:
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
b: https://search.brave.com/search?q=%s BraveSearch
aw: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php?search=%s ArchWiki
a: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s?k=%s Amazon
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
x: https://twitter.com/search?q=%s X
